message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am unable to meet you at $13,000. I would like to stick to my original offer of $12,000.
